original_text: The Lord said to me, ‘Go to a potter. Buy from him a pot that he has made from clay. Take with you some leaders of the people and some leaders of the priests.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 가서 토기장이의 옹기를 사고 백성의 어른들과 제사장의 어른 몇 사람과

sentences.original_text: that he has made from clay
Take with you some leaders of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성의 지도자 몇 사람을 데리고 가라

sentences.original_text: and some leaders of the priests
